channel.title: CVE Feed for Rapid7 -- Nexpose
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rapid7 -- Nexpose

item.title: CVE-2022-0757|2024-09-16T17:48:14.153Z -- rapid7 -- nexpose
item.description: Rapid7 Nexpose versions 6.6.93 and earlier are susceptible to an SQL Injection vulnerability, whereby valid search operators are not defined. This lack of validation can allow a logged-in, authenticated attacker to manipulate the "ANY" and "OR" operators in the SearchCriteria and inject SQL code. This issue was fixed in Rapid7 Nexpose version 6.6.129.
